column4: I have 6 oil tankers in my yard, and they all run ubuntu. But the httpd doesn't seem to work right :/ Could somebody help me? And the i accidentally with /etc, is that wrong?
Lets hear about how you managed to get Ubuntu on those ?
well i accidentally got my cd in all of the machines, and it went all spining.. Then it showed the splash screen, etc. in smoke trail.
I have engaged many friends, a few millions because i like Daniel Baumann's work. Perhaps i can meet a few who doesnt like it.
so what;s with the httpd in oil tankers?
Make it so or we shall anger up a bit before inviting the hells angels
Perhaps some day, you can party some
myeah.. but i need httpd now! cuz boss will be angry otherwise
You seem ok, be nice towards the bozz kid
ok - i got http and mysql d's working.. but will 7 oil tankers handle 1000 connections? cuz i have a large web project like 4chan.. and i will be the first one who uses oil tankers as servers
what do you mean by that?
